      • createTable

        public void createTable(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.Class<?> storageType)
                 throws NoDefaultConstructorException
        Creates a table if it doesn't exist already with name as name and with the fields of storageType as columns Call this in your plugin/module initialisation
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the database
        storageType - the column template
        Throws:
        NoDefaultConstructorException

      • saveObject

        public void saveObject(java.lang.String table,
                       java.lang.Object object)
        Saves the bject to table, automatically parses all fields of the object to their sql equivalent.
        Supported field types include:
        • Integer
        • String
        • Boolean
        • Long
        • UUID
        • Location
        • Collection
        • Map


        If the type isn't listed above, it will try to convert the object to json using Google's Gson
        Parameters:
        table - the table to save object to
        object - the object to save

      • saveObjectAsync

        public void saveObjectAsync(java.lang.String table,
                            java.lang.Object object)
        Saves the bject to table, automatically parses all fields of the object to their sql equivalent.
        Supported field types include:
        • Integer
        • String
        • Boolean
        • UUID
        • Location
        • Collection
        • Map


        If the type isn't listed above, it will try to convert the object to json using Google's Gson
        Parameters:
        table - the table to save object to
        object - the object to save

      • getObject

        public java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.String table,
                                  SQLSelector... sqlSelectors)
                           throws DataObtainException
        Gets the object where selector == value from table Returns a Collection of said object if multiple objects are found in the database that match the selectors
        Parameters:
        table - the table
        sqlSelectors - the selectors to use
        Returns:
        the object found in the database
        Throws:
        DataObtainException

      • getAllObjects

        public <T> java.util.Collection<T> getAllObjects(java.lang.String table)
                                          throws DataObtainException
        Gets all the objects in a table using SELECT * FROM table
        Parameters:
        table - the target table
        Returns:
        a Collection of objects that are stored in the table
        Throws:
        DataObtainException - thrown when there's an issue obtaining the data
        See Also:
        this.getObject
